outcome: BCI malfunctions lead to arbitrary access denials and permissions, causing quiet chaos in daily life. Council factions turn inward, doubting the system. Faith in the city's order unravels beneath a calm surface.

events.description: Transit gates and housing doors begin refusing access without warning. Citizens queue at help stations for basic permissions, receiving only automated apologies.
A Harmonist Council member finds their own BCI score inexplicably reduced, blocking entry to the Council chamber. Blame shifts to system 'glitches,' but tension rises among factions.
Certain work teams gain spontaneous upgrades—faster transit or premium food—while others find basic resources denied. Resentment spreads as no pattern is clear.
Rumors erupt that compliance behaviors are now random, sparking a wave of hushed self-censorship and citizens retreating from public life.
Council members call closed emergency talks—each blaming others for BCI instability. No solution emerges as trust in the Council and system erodes.
